subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Diving and Divers
Olympic Games (2008)
Ears and Hearing
lead_paragraph: Chris Colwill was born with a 60 percent hearing loss. But that hasn’t stopped him from pursuing his dream of making the United States Olympic diving team this summer.
snippet: Chris Colwill was born with a 60 percent hearing loss. But that hasn’t stopped him from pursuing his dream of making the United States Olympic diving team this summer.
